membership.contestantName: CD Leones Negros de la Universidad de Guadalajara

messages:
Name: Fidel Martínez
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: February 15, 1990
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Tijuana
Liga MX clubs played for: Tijuana, Leones Negros UdeG, Pumas UNAM, Atlas, Querétaro

Midfielder Fidel Martínez plays for Tijuana and has made 17 appearances in this season's Liga MX, with 14 of these coming for his current club. He had previously played for Tijuana in the competition during 2021/2022.

Martínez last made an appearance in a competition game on March 2, playing 45 minutes for Querétaro versus América in a 1-1 draw. In total, he has netted one Liga MX goal in 2021/2022, and provided one assist. He has been shown a yellow card twice.
His opening goal of the campaign came in the 2-1 loss against León on July 31.
Up next up for Tijuana - who are in 18th place on 15 points - in Liga MX action is a trip to Monterrey on May 1.
Last season for Tijuana, Martínez made 17 Liga MX appearances, scored eight goals and provided two assists.
Martínez linked up with Tijuana in January 2022 from Querétaro, for whom he made three league appearances in total.
